title: Drawing, "View of the Picture Gallery at the Château d'Eu (Vue de la Galerie au Château d'Eu)", 1844
medium: Brush and watercolor, white gouache, graphite on paper
provenance: Eugene V. Thaw Collection; Galerie Jacques Fischer, Paris
description: In this view, the highly decorated Galerie des Guises in the Chateau d'Eu is lighted by three large crystal chandeliers and additional wall candelabra. The coffered ceiling in a square pattern reflects the design of the inlaid floor. Portrait paintings of the Renaissance period are placed in panels along the walls. A lone visitor, hat in hand, gazes up at a painting.

exhibitions.title: House Proud: 19th Century Watercolor Interiors from the Thaw Collection

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "View of the Picture Gallery at the Château d'Eu (Vue de la Galerie au Château d'Eu)", 1844.
1844. Brush and watercolor, white gouache, graphite on paper. Thaw Collection. 2007-27-34.
